ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Are you sure to generate Tax ?')
MlsTrans('Some have been filled with tax numbers. Do you want to revise the Tax Number ?')
MlsTrans('Do you want your tax number to be reused ?')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DocEntry, DocType from OINV where Vatsum>0 and Canceled='N' and DocDate between ':2' and ':3' :1 order by docdate desc

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Are you sure to generate Tax ?')
MlsTrans('Tax series not enough. Please add new tax number !')

Text.val: Ada revisi namun no tax sebelumnya YA digunakan kembali
Ada revisi namun no tax sebelumnya TIDAK digunakan kembali

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('NO SERIES OINV = '&Trim(MID({0,4},4,Len({0,4})-3))&' || NO SERIES ARTAXNO = '&IF(Trim({0,7})='' OR ISNULL({0,7}),'Kosong',Trim({0,7}))&' || INV NO ARTAXNO = '&Trim({0,11})&' ')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select ROW_NUMBER () over (partition by DocEntry order by docentry,LineNum) URUTAN, * from ( select OI.DocEntry, OI.DocNum, IIF(OI.DocType='I','Item',IIF(OI.DocType='S','Service','Fixed Asset')) 'DocType', OI.DocDate, OI.CardCode, OI.CardName, OC.VatIdNum 'NPWP', OC.Address, OI.IgloLineTotal 'Gross', OI.VatSum 'PPN_H', OI.DiscSum 'Disc_H', OI.DocTotal 'Net', OI.NTSeTaxNo, OI1.LineNum, OI1.ItemCode, OI1.Dscription, OI1.Quantity, OI1.PriceBefDi 'HargaAwal', OI1.Quantity*OI1.PriceBefDI 'HARGAxQTY', OI1.DiscPrcnt, OI1.Price 'HargaStlhDiskon', OI1.VatPrcnt, OI1.PriceAfVAT 'PPN_D', OI1.Quantity*OI1.PriceAfVAT 'AmountTax', OI1.LineTotal from OINV OI (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN OCRD OC (NOLOCK) on OI.CardCode=OC.CardCode LEFT JOIN INV1 OI1 (NOLOCK) on OI.DocEntry=OI1.DocEntry where OI.VatSum>0 and OI.Canceled='N' and (OI.NTSeTaxNo <> '' or OI.NTSeTaxNo is not null) and OI.DocDate between ':1' and ':2' ) as ZZZ

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToHTML(0,'DocNum,DocType,DocDate,CardName,NPWP,Address,Gross,PPN_H,Disc_H,Net,NTSeTaxNo,Dscription,Quantity,HargaAwal,DiscPrcnt,HargaStlhDiskon,VatPrcnt,PPN_D,AmountTax,LineTotal', 'Document Number,Type,Document Date,Customer,NPWP,Address,Sub Total,Tax Total,Discount,Total Payment,Tax Number,Item Name,Quantity,Price,Disc/Item %,PriceAftDisc,Tax %,Value Tax/Item,Amount Tax,Amount',{32768,84},'',0)
